extension.news: 1.1.3 - Added afFENity 1.1.2 - Added Fen Light 1.1.1 - Minor bug fixes and cleanup 1.1.0 - Cleaned up code. Changed addonid from script to plugin. Added TheLab, TheLabjr, Dradis, Taz19 1.0.9 - Fixed bug preventing Umbrella 3D from being disabled. 1.0.8 - Added support for DV and 3D settings. Added Patriot, Black Lightning and 9-Lives. 1.0.7 - Added Coalition and Absolution. Removed The Promise. 1.0.6 - Added chains genocide and Quicksilver. 1.0.5 - Initial Release.
99.0.5 - Fixed Base player 99.0.4 - Fixed Fen Light and afFENity players 99.0.3 - Added Fen Light and afFENity. 99.0.2 - Minor bug fixes. 99.0.1 - Cleaned up code. 99.0.0 - Initial Release.

extension.summary: Access your content from Furk, Easynews and Debrid Clouds.
extension.description: This add-on is intended for advanced Kodi users only. You must own the content of any media you play through this addon.
extension.disclaimer: The author of this addon does not host any of the content which is found and has no affiliation with any of the content providers.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.news: INFO: For latest changes see Changelog within Tools of add-on.
